description: This file demonstrates how to use the FirecrawlTools within an agent, including setting up the agent with specific tools, and making search and crawl requests.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can utilize tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: FirecrawlTools
classes.description: A tool for web crawling and searching using the Firecrawl API.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response from the agent after performing a task.
